attributes.action: Review to decrease university tuition fees due to EU referendum result
attributes.background: The free movement of EU meant graduates had a much wider pool of jobs to apply for, there's a good chance this will be greatly diminished  Study abroad programmes will also be hit hard due to visa introduction. much of what was offered by uni has now been withdrawn and employability threatened.

rejection.details: The action you call for is not sufficiently specific. There are a number of other petitions currently open which call for various changes to be made to student fees and funding.
